testcase.classname: US_24_TC_01 System should allow creating new countries using the API endpoint
testcase.name: US_24_TC_01 User can Just create each state 1 by 1

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. Expected status code <201> but was <400>.

testcase.failure:
Given Given The user sends a POST request to REST API endpoint "https://www.gmibank.com/api/tp-states" and create "TEXAS1" state.passed And After creation, the HTTP Status Code should be "201"....................failed Then After creation user verifies the created state "TEXAS1"................skipped
